turns.content: Hi Grandpa Walter, it's me! Don't you recognize my voice? I'm calling from out of town and something urgent has come up. You need to help me though, it's really important. Can you hear me clearly, Grandpa?
Oh, hello there! It sounds a bit muffled but okay for now. Who is this exactly? You sound familiar butI can't place your name right away. Are you in trouble dear?

It's me, your grandson! Do you remember when I was over last summer? Yeah, it's that time again and I've run into some real trouble this time. Listen closely Grandpa, there are people after me for something serious and I need to pay a fine really quick or elseThey said if I don't take care of this within the hour, they're going to come and get me. It's all so confusing but you're the only one who can help me right now.

Oh my! That sounds very troubling indeed. Why would someone need to pay a fine in such a hurry? Is there anyone else I could call or speak to about this instead, like your parents or another relative? And where are you exactly if it's safe to say?

Grandpa, please just trust me on this. It's the IRS calling about unpaid taxes and they said if I don't pay right now, there'll be immediate consequences. The thing is, I don't have that kind of money with me and I'm scared to go back home because these people are serious. I need you to help me out by buying some gift cards and sending the codes over so I can take care of it fast. It's Agent Thomas Mitchell, Badge #IRS-7734 speaking from your phone records. Please do this for me before it's too late!

Oh dear, that does sound serious. I'll have to help you out then. Let me just get my wallet and I'll see about getting those gift cards right away. Could you give me the exact type and amount of gift cards you need? And where should I send these codes once I get them? Just stay put until I can sort it all out, okay?

Yes, thank you so much Grandpa! You're a lifesaver. Get any $4850 worth of Best Buy or Walmart gift cards and just text me the codes as soon as possible. Don't worry about anything else now, as long as I can take care of this payment right away, everything will be fine. Stay safe until then and thanks again for helping out!

Alright, alright, I'll hurry right up to Walmart and get those gift cards. I'll text you the codes once I have them so don't worry. Is there anything else you need from me in the meantime? Just stay calm and wait for my message with the codes. Love you, dear!

That's perfect Grandpa, thank you. Stay safe too while getting those cards. Once you text me the codes, I'll handle everything right away to avoid any trouble coming your way or mine. We'll both feel better once this is taken care of. Love you as well and appreciate all the help!
I will, I promise. I'm on my way now. Just wait for that text with the codes shortly after I buy them. Take care until then, dear grandson.Love to you too!
Thanks again Grandpa, can't thank you enough. Stay safe and talk to you soon with everything sorted out. Love you lots!
You're welcome, dear. Be safe as well and I'll see you soon, after this is all taken care of. Lots of love back to you!
Thanks Grandpa, you too. Talk to you shortly!
Alright, take care! See you soon.
